resources.string: To run this application Your device must have NFC Technology. Unfortunently Your device does not have NFC.Sorry for this inconvenience. Please press OK to exit.
Without NFC You cannot read Tags.Currently NFC is not enabled in your Device. Please go to the wireless settings and Enable NFC.
Press any items to see details and write into block.
RED Color blocks (Page #0 to #3) are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are for OTP, manufacturer data, and locking bits
RED Color blocks (Page #0 to #3) and page(#40 to #43) are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are for OTP, manufacturer data, and locking bits
RED Color blocks (Page #0 to #3) and page(#40 to #41) are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are for OTP, manufacturer data, and locking bits
RED Color blocks are manufacturer area. You can not modify this block. This blocks are used for locking
